activities: This certification covers the privacy practices for Citrix ShareFile. ShareFile  provides software that allows businesses to securely exchange business files with clients and others in a password-protected space. Customers can utilize ShareFile to securely send large files by email, conduct a secure file transfer and collaborate. As part of the signup process, customers must enter their name and email address and may optionally enter their company name. Also, paid customers must provide billing and contact information such as address, credit card number, and telephone number.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
privacyprograms: ShareFile is a licensee of the TRUSTe Privacy Program and of TRUSTe's EU Safe Harbor Web Seal program.
recoursemech: For questions or concerns regarding privacy statements and ShareFile, the first point of contact is to write to privacy@sharefile.com. For any unresolved complaints or if a complaint is not satisfactorily addressed, the organization utilizes TRUSTe (www.truste.com) as its dispute resolution mechanism.
